divs: Sighting DetailsI was with my brother and a friend talking and my friend and I saw a passing blue orb flying over our heads and then was seen again by my brother and my amigo.Depois we were talking and we saw a normal star, then she began to move from side to side and it was as if she went off her light and was red and it was as if he was cold and gray and darker with a ball in the middle like a cabin, and even at night you could see this object with claresa and then he grew up and eventually disappear. Here in Sao Luis - Maranhao, Brazil I've seen many UFOs I think if someone would check for sure see them too ...
Summary: I saw two orbs, and a UFO that looked like a star
trends: There have been no other sightings in São Luís
This sighting has never been favorited.
